name: Guardians and Wards Act, 1890
1:
Guardians and Wards Act,1890 1. Title, extent and commencement (1) This Act may be called the Guardians and Wards Act, 1890.(2) It extends to whole of India l[except the State of Jammu and
Kashmir].2[***](3) It shall come into force on the first day of July, 1890.
